Badger Corporate Bus.name: Badger Corporate Bus
Badger Corporate Bus.description: A luxurious bus for corporate road trips. Equally ell equipped for work meetings and after meeting drinks.

Bellhop.name: Bellhop
Bellhop.description: A one seat Gyrocopter which can be folded to the size of a large suitcase.

Chupacabra.name: Chupacabra
Chupacabra.description: Compact Groundcar built from recycled parts from older vehicles. Low-tech but high-horse-power.

Ebi.name: Ebi
Ebi.description: Small but well thought out Compact Groundcar.

Grundy.name: Grundy
Grundy.description: Armored industrial looking Compact Grouncar, with a powerful combat plow.

Harriet 100.name: Harriet 100
Harriet 100.description: A classic Roadbike with a more feminine look.

Harvey Merc.name: Harvey Merc
Harvey Merc.description: A classic roadbike, this time with mounted weapons.

Herakles.name: Herakles
Herakles.description: AV4 type troop transport, armored and armed.

Highway Master Artemis.name: Highway Master Artemis
Highway Master Artemis.description: A low-riding Roadbike with retractable glass cover. Has a surpercharge mode that doesn't come with a safety guarantee.

JetBoy Hoverboard.name: JetBoy Hoverboard
JetBoy Hoverboard.description: A hoverboard driven with Athletics Skill. Can't be upgraded.

MegaHauler.name: MegaHauler
MegaHauler.description: Armored truck transport. As much a train as a car.

Paladin 500.name: Paladin 500
Paladin 500.description: A High Performance Groundcar. Now you can be MadMax. In town. With two mounted Machine Guns.

SH-45 Patroller Law.name: SH-45 Patroller Law
SH-45 Patroller Law.description: One seat Gyrocopter. Police version, with mounted Machine Gun.

Sliver.name: Sliver
Sliver.description: A Roadbike with all the gadgets you'd ever need.

Street King Combat Vehicle.name: Street King Combat Vehicle
Street King Combat Vehicle.description: A High Performance Groundcar which is large, armored and has a military look.

The Zacatzontli Pickup Truck.name: The Zacatzontli Pickup Truck
The Zacatzontli Pickup Truck.description: A Compact Groundcar equipped for off-road travel.

Thunder-X.name: Thunder-X
Thunder-X.description: A top of the line High Performance Groundcar.

Volkhov.name: Volkhov
Volkhov.description: An armored pickup Compact Groundcar with mounted machine gun. Comes with a bottle of vodka.
